pageContext.claim: “Now the Democrats are saying NO Relief to...... ....Alabama, Iowa, Nebraska, Georgia, South Carolina, North Carolina and others unless much more money is given to Puerto Rico. The Dems don't want farmers to get any help. Puerto Rico should be very happy and the Dems should stop blocking much needed Disaster Relief!”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats were onboard with Sen. David Perdue's disaster relief bill, according to Sen. Patrick Leahy, the top Democrat on the Senate Appropriations Committee. But then Trump told Senate Republicans to exclude funding for Puerto Rico's recovery from Hurricane Maria. The resulting bill excluded some Puerto Rico funding and Democrats were opposed.
